FutureCalculator

- less than 1 min read time
Tags: iOS-App Mathematics Swift

Screenshots

Description

The one and only calculator for iPhone and iPad - easy, quick and with many new functions.

Functions like:

  • Probability Theory: (binomkoefficient, binompdf, binomcdf, normalcdf, invNorm)

  • Confidence intervals (Konfigam, Konfisih, Konfiumf)

  • Quadratic Equations (Quad)

  • Trigonometry (sin, cos, tan, sin-1, cos-1, tan-1, sinh, cosh, tanh)

  • Vectors (Cross-Product)

  • and many more (Modulo, e-function, Logarithms)

Calculation History: See and use your latest results while continuing calculating!

Have fun with calculating!

by Philip Leindecker
